div.ab:
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
هذا كتاب من شهاب بن عمرو
عامل الأمير أبي غالب بن الإصبهبذ
أعز اللّه نصره على مدر ورزم براه لمير بن
بك إنّي قبضت منك ممّا صار عليك
من خراج سنة ثمان وأربعين ومئة
عشرة دراهم قبضت ذلك منك
وبرئت إلي منها وكتب في صفر
سنة خمسين ومئة
شهاب للّه

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
hāḏā kitāb:un min šihāba bni ʿamr:ini
ʿāmili ăl ʾamīri ʾabī ġālibi bni ăl ʾiṣbahbaḏi
ʾaʿazza ăl lāhu naṣra hu ʿalà madra wa rizma barāʾaẗ:un li mīri bni
baka ʾin nī qabaḍtu min ka mimmā ṣāra ʿalay ka
min ḫarāǧi sanaẗi ṯamān:in wa ʾarbaʿīna wa miʾaẗ:in
ʿašaraẗa darāhima qabaḍtu ḏālika min ka
wa bariʾta ʾilay ya min hā wa kutiba fī ṣafar:in
sanaẗa ḫamsīna wa miʾaẗ:in
šihābu li l lāhi

In the name of God, the Merciful and Compassionate.
This is a document from Shihāb ibn ʿAmr,
the financial administrator of the governor ʾAbū Ġālib ibn al-ʾIṣbahbadh,
may God strengthen his victory, (whose jurisdiction is) over Madr and Rizm, a quittance for Mīr ibn
Bēk. I have received from you what you owe
with regard to the kharāj of the year one hundred and forty-eight
ten dirhams. I have received that from you
and you have been released from (the obligation to pay) them to me. It has been written in Ṣafar
of the year one hundred and fifty.
Shihāb, for God
